articles.author: Chris Fedor, cleveland.com
articles.title: Cavs have bigger goals after securing playoff spot for first time in 25 years without LeBron James: ‘We ain’t - cleveland.com
articles.description: There was no over-the-top locker room jubilee. No water-bucket dumping. No dance party or impromptu karaoke session. That toned-down scene inside Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse late Sunday night speaks volumes.

articles.author: Brenna White
articles.title: Dolphins HC Mike McDaniel on QB Tua Tagovailoa's potential for next season: 'I can see a hunger in him' - NFL.com
articles.description: Dolphins HC Mike McDaniel is looking to the future, especially with young quarterback Tua Tagovailoa. "I can see a hunger in him that I’m excited to watch play out,” McDaniel said to NFL Network Insider Tom Pelissero on Sunday at the Annual League Meeting.
articles.content: Tagovailoa, who started a total of 13 games during the 2022 season, threw for 3,548 yards with 25 touchdowns and only eight interceptions. But the 25-year-old suffered two concussions that required h… [+1142 chars]

articles.title: Kidd: Mavs plan to 'spend some time' with Doncic - The Official Home of the Dallas Mavericks - Mavs.com
articles.description: Dallas Mavericks coach Jason Kidd said the Mavs' organization plan to be there for point guard Luka Doncic in whatever capacity. After last Friday's loss to the Charlotte Hornets, Doncic said he was going through some private issues.
articles.content:
CHARLOTTE Dallas Mavericks coach Jason Kidd said the organization is ready, willing and able to offer Luka Doncic whatever help he needs.
